reviews.title: Cheese-burger
reviews.description: Since I always consider the quality and the price of the food in every place we dine into, I will say that their food quality vs price isn't that bad at all. In fact, it's a value for your money - considering the taste overall.

reviews.title: Fish-burger
reviews.description: best tasting burger around - beats the heck out of In and Out skinny burgers and McDonald's cardboard shingles except the handmade Counter burger but it costs about 50% more than 5 Guys.

reviews.title: Mushroom-burger
reviews.description: Super sweet fatty liempo like bacon Oh so Yummy mozarella sticks and chicken skin Lame bread

reviews.title: Double-burger
reviews.description: Legit taste of burgers!!! Kudos team! I would definitely come back here. Not bad for a first timer like me. Burgers here are all mouthwatering!

reviews.title: Chicken-burger
reviews.description: Burgers are delicious. Fast, nice variety of choices, generous portions on the french fries. Enough tables to dine in. Good burgers, we like this place!

reviews.title: Mozzarella
reviews.description: Their burgers are some of the most tastiest burgers I've had! I also loved their hambacon that takes their burgers to the next level! Don't forget to try their mozzarella sticks too!!!
